images.caption: Figure 1.Overview of the STAR framework compared to the QGpT baseline. STAR improves representation via two stages: (1) replacing top-kksampling withHeader-aware Clusteringfor diverse instance selection and query generation, and (2) replacing simple concatenation withWeighted Fusionto explicitly model the importance of structured data and synthetic queries. Different colors denote different semantic row clusters.

header: Appendix APrompt for Pseudo Query Generation
